website_summaries.verdict: A durable and quality memory foam topper that stands out for holding up over time.
pros: Not only do users report that this topper is a good value for the money, but some say it holds up well and still feels excellent after months of use
cons: Over time the foam tends to discolor, and a few feel it becomes less supportive over time

website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight yet luxurious mattress topper offering a soft and cool surface for a fair price.
pros: Customers love that this gel mattress topper’s affordability and plush nature despite its thinner structure and report a pain-free sleep with no odor issues
The foam layer offers pressure point relief that gently cradles sore joints and muscles
cons: Some users experienced sensitivity to an initial chemical odor, and others found that the topper was not firm enough for their liking

website_summaries.verdict: While is probably won't work for those who like firmer mattresses, it's perfect if you prefer softness over support.
pros: A budget-friendly mattress topper with flexible support that gets praise for "hugging" your body
Excellent for users who don't like firm mattresses
cons: Not quite as durable as some competitors – prone to tears
Too "squishy" for some users, but others find this quality a plus

customer_reviews.title: Amazon made good on it
customer_reviews.text: This is in no way memory foam. I was in the bedding business before I retired and I can tell you this is just cheap foam. Memory foam will hold an imprint when you press down and slowly recover. This does no such thing. It in my opinion is false advertising. Amazon made good on it; but still it was a nuisance to receive and have to dispose of it. Very disappointing!!! Soft cheap foam which offers no support!
customer_reviews.author: cyberspeak

customer_reviews.title: New or Used foam pad?
customer_reviews.text: Foam Bedding arrived and I was initially concerned because it was wrapped in Saran wrapped and has a medium size tear in it. After unrolling the foam pad I noticed small debris on it. The foam looks clean and there’s no odor. I feel that the item is used and I’m afraid to put it on my bed. I will return once I figure how to get it back in the box. Frustrating. I wanted to refresh my sleeping space for the new year.
customer_reviews.author: S.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have slept only a couple nights on it so far.. I will update in the future after some more wear! Pros: - mine didn't come with a smell, crease, or any tears. perfect condition. - it easily fits under most mattress protectors as well! - very durable. - great quality for the price. - perfect for side sleepers! it feels so soft :) Cons: - there is a slight discoloration after two nights, though it doesn't bother me. No weird smells or feeling along with it. I thought keeping a white mattress protector on top would protect it, but perhaps it's a temperature thing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my RV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in my RV on my short queen sized bed. It came quick and was compactly packaged. It had a smell, but after a few hours venting, it was fine. It is very comfortable and makes the brand new rv mattress better for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Marie

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE: NOT MEMORY FOAM JUST FOAM
customer_reviews.text: Read all of the positive reviews and thought this was the one...so disappointed. Came in a box with no instructions. Super light weight and definitely should not be classified as "memory" foam because it has no memory. Watch my video because a picture is worth a thousand words. Sending this back if I can get in the box.
customer_reviews.author: allyco

customer_reviews.title: Not memory foam
customer_reviews.text: Not memory foam. Feels like cheap egg carton foam. The smell eventually went away. But doesn't offer the contour support like memory foam. Not comfortable to sleep on for longer than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first negative feedback I ever have to post on Amazon and I am frequent Amazon shopper. First of all, I purchased this product based on its reviews. I aired it out for 3 days before trying to put on my mattress. As I was spreading on the mattress, it was tearing. The quality I find to be worst than the foam sponge one pays a dollar a pack from the dollar store. Nothing angered me than hadden to shipped it back. I cannot comment on the feel of it, I didn't get a chance to sleep on it. I have attached some pictures. Very angry!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia nsiwah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sleep, but a surprise after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about two weeks ago now so that my girlfriend would be comfortable sleeping on my mattress, which was far too firm for her. It was perfect for that and we both slept much more comfortably than we have in months. Today I stripped the bed to change and wash the sheets, and I discovered the pad had turned green. It seems to still be perfectly functional, but the color change was concerning, to say the least! Has anyone else had this problem, or do you know why this might have happened?
customer_reviews.author: Edward B.

customer_reviews.title: Low memory foam to high polyurethane foam mix
customer_reviews.text: I was seeking a gel foam with a slower response time. Their video makes it appear to have more memory foam than the product I was sent. I'm sure this is why this product is so inexpensive. My video shows the actual response time. You can see there is much more regular polyurethane foam than memory foam. I like the gel swirl foams because the mix of foams sleep cooler. I was just expecting a different ratio. There needs to be more regulation of foam bedding. In particular, manufacturers need to start indicating the ratios of foam types along with density. Good gel foam is hard to find in one-off sheets
customer_reviews.author: Age

customer_reviews.title: Big win for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical because I HATE overly soft foam mattress pads. But I thought that it being only two inches think,it couldn't be too bad for the back. In fact, the gel swirl is significant in the description. It has a feel similar to a mattress with a liquid bladder. It's soft, but it doesn't over-compress. Recommend that you let breath a couple of hours after unpacking, before use and you won't smell anything; but I don't think it i intended to be the primary pad under a sheet. Buy this and the pillow top mattress cover and you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Luxury
customer_reviews.text: I've only slept on this one night, but here's what I experienced: I left it out flat overnight to regain its shape. It has NO smell to it and did regain its shape in a few hours. We think we have a CA king bed, but found the foam topper to be a 6" longer than the bed, but it was easy to cut off with scissors, which we did, and got the fitted sheets to go over everything. The bed now feels completely luxurious, like the most expensive mattress in the world---soft but not too soft. I think this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen a lot of comments/questions about whether or not it cools you down. Most memory foam mattresses hold heat and tend to make you sleep warmer. I do not like being too warm when I sleep. This does not cool you down per say but it does not hold heat like the others and will not make you warmer than you already are which is a huge plus with memory foam. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ivy8

customer_reviews.title: This is not the “gel” foam you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is a farce. Please find this review helpful to prevent other people from foolishly purchasing this “gel” foam. Note the pattern is gel like... the material is not. There is no firmness, none. It’s worse than that cheap foam you get at Menards. I don’t write reviews but this con job took the cake. And yes it smells, if you have nose. I would say it smells strongly like those peanut kisses you get at Halloween. You know the black and orange kind 10% of the population likes. So buyer beware, I thought 4 stars and American made...can’t go wrong...oh yes...you can.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Easily torn
customer_reviews.text: I realize it's only 2" foam, but this foam is very easly torn. Even just tugging on it will cause it to tear. Save your money and look for something more durable. We used this two nights in our camper and it is now almost in two pieces. Disappointed for this being a made in USA product
customer_reviews.author: W. Ley

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on the guest bed my son uses when visiting several times a year. He complained of back aches before but now finds it very comfortable. However I found the initial smell very strong and unpleasant. I spread the topper on the bed, closed the door to the room and opened a window periodically over 4 days before I found it tolerable. It now seems fine. Although I have a standard fitted mattress pad on top it tends to shift slightly with use. I haven't had it long enough to know about durability but it definitely improved the comfort of the mattress! It feels like laying on a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M.

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defects: Are all the twin sized like this?
customer_reviews.text: Had to speak to five different Amazon customer service phone reps with multiple transfers by them to try to get any response to these picture. I sent them to the adress they finally gave m, cs-reply@amazon.com to attn: Zovy but Zovy disconnected with no response & had to start over, telling 2 more reps I'd sent the photos. they put me on hold & then disconnected. No email response either. Mattress also has a small cut in it! For over sixty dollars(including tax) I was hoping for an intact topper!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: You Will Sleep With A Smile
customer_reviews.text: Better than I anticipated!! This memory foam topper arrived as scheduled and fit the mattress perfectly. There were no strange chemical smells to contend with, actually no odors at all. That they are Made in the USA is a major bonus. What I expected was a basic memory foam topper that would make my hard mattress more endurable. What I GOT was wicked cool... a Full Nights Sleep with no sciatic or lower back pain...no twisting and turning and adjusting to try and find a comfortable point(to dream the impossible dream) all thru the night! Wow! This is The Bomb!!! I can honestly and without reservation recommend this DreamFoam topper to anyone who would like to sleep. Period. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfort for everyone to enjoy a wonderfully restful sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! I had bought a gel foam mattress to replaced an old one, however my back still hurt. I wish I had bought the gel pad earlier as it forms to my body. Even if I notice an ache in my back during the night, it molds to my back so the pain is not as severe as it would be without the gel pad. I highly recommend this product and manufacturer!!! I saw a similar gel pad at my neighbor store, this one was half the price. With Amazon prime free delivery, the cost was incomparable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality topper
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the topper is poor. It comes completely crammed into a tiny box, and many of the areas in the surfaces seem to be affected by the uneven way it was shipped. It also has all these large pores in certain areas. That cannot be good for long-lasting topper. I don't understand how this product has 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: George A.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 1.5 years ago. Upon receipt, no issues at all, no off gassing, no smell. Very comfortable, a bit heavy, and sleeps a bit warm. The problem came in about 6 months ago. There are tears developing all across the pad. If you move it, it tears very, very easily. I've been careful with it since the first small tear, but now it's to the point of it tears when I change the sheets. Very comfy, and super soft...but not resilient. As a short term, stop gap comfort fixer, it's great. If you plan this for a long term thing...be prepared to buy more than one.
customer_reviews.author: Bil

customer_reviews.title: My neck, my back, my muscles and my sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Stop being cheap and just buy the DAM thing! I bought this for my gf's bed. She didn't believe me that her bed sucked and was the cause of us losing our sleep. When I would sleep on her bed, I would toss and turn and wake up with crazy back pain. I got fed up and searched for a topper/foam pad online. This was the CHEAPEST method. I slept so good that following week. The only thing I hate is the bed sheet cover sticks on the foam when putting on to cover the bed. Also, would have been nice if the made the foam with round edges instead of corners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This gave me the MOST COMFORTABLE  bed in the world! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these. 1 twin. 2 full and 1 queen. I bought the 2". It's like sleeping in a expensive pillow top. I'm 5ft 5 and 190lbs. It has not gone flat or shifted. I covered it with a protective sheet, but it hasn't moved or split. No smell or any problems at all. I was worried reading reviews but with all 4, l have had no problems and they fit the beds perfect. I'm and over the moon with this purchase. It gives me the best and most comfortable sleep of my life! My sons is on a futon bed and he feels same. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha S.

customer_reviews.title: Boy...does it smell!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I've purchased. First for our RV and it worked like magic. Made the bed extremely comfortable. And I don't recall a strong smell. I purchased another one for a queen bed and it came fairly squished in the plastic wrap. It took at least 3 days for it to gain the correct shape (but it did). Also, I had it outside all three days since the chemical smell (almost like a contaminated dirt) was so strong. I've now had it for over a month and it still has a smell, although not as strong. Not sure why this one was so much worse that the first...
customer_reviews.author: Shopper#10M

customer_reviews.title: Pair with TEXARTIST Mattress Pad Pillow Top Cover
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Previously had tried a serta 3 inch mattress pad but it was not only hard to get in and out of, but i woke up with back and neck pain. I did some research and decided on this 2 inch matress pad. It doesnt come with a protective cover so i paired it with rhe TEXARTIST Mattress Pad Pillow Top Cover. My sleep is wonderful, it's comfortable without sucking you in, and I don't have neck or back pain. Worth every penny. I strongly recommend pairing the pad and cover together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonkat

customer_reviews.title: like sleeping on a cloud, no pain in my joints
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought it for my futon, but it was too big for it....so I decided to put it on my memory foam bed, which was 3 years old and made me toss and turn all night. I put this Gel Swirl Memory Foam pad on my bed, and for the first time in years, I slept through a whole night.....it felt like I was was sleeping on a cloud. It took away the pain on my pressure point areas, such as my shoulders, hips, knees and such......I couldn't believe how comfortable this was to sleep on....it is a bit warmer, but the fact I can sleep in peace makes that worth it.....
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Powell

customer_reviews.title: Received two defective toppers
customer_reviews.text: First topper did not fully compress at the edge. Amazon sent a replacement topper. The second one did not fit the king size bed correctly (too long and not wide enough). I think they inadvertently sent a Cal King size. The 2nd topper also had two dark large yellow stains on it. Amazon would not send out another replacement unless I shipped the defective one back. Good luck finding a box big enough to fit an uncompressed king size topper back. So I am stuck with a defective topper and out $100. Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: utche96

customer_reviews.title: and we got a pretty firm one
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhhh! This topper is fluffy baby cloud! We got a new mattress a year or so ago, and we got a pretty firm one, since our last one was so sad and saggy by the end of it's life. My back was really hurting, I assumed it was from how firm the mattress was. I ordered this topper based on others reviews. in hopes it would help my back. It's made a big difference! My husband and I both love it. It feels amazing. I mostly sleep on my tummy these days, but I can sleep on my side without it hurting too with this in place! Would highly recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: If you like a warm bed this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: It was easily packaged, holds up well, made the bed much softer. The problem I have is being hot at night and I thought this would make it cooler-just the opposite for me. I’m not sure if it’s due to using it during the summer months-icing in the south with warmer temp., menopause, the wrong product for me? I have read that foam toppers with holes are the coolest? I sleep with an overhead fan on year round. Maybe there are ideas others have that makes it cooler? Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Thornton

customer_reviews.title: This sucks and is not worth my money.
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE. I saw so many reviews on how fast this unrolled and how it inflated well. Then I saw others about how curvy the edges were and how some edges were inflated. Mine was the latter. It never inflated in the areas that were flattened by this stupid rolled up idea. It got delivered earlier than expected, so I unrolled it and waited more than 24 hours and it still looked like a piece of crap. I will definitely be returning and ordering from a more reliable and consistent shop.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Five stars despite the initial smell
customer_reviews.text: Two nights in and I absolutely LOVE this mattress topper. It is incredibly comfortable and makes my bed feel like a cloud. I have noticed I am falling asleep much faster since using this topper. The only warning i give is that there is a smell when you first unroll it. I recommend airing it out a few hours with the windows open before putting it on your bed. I made the mistake of letting it air out on the bed, on top of the sheets, and the sheets smelled like paint after. But after the smell subsides, it is an absolute dream purchase.
customer_reviews.author: charm9389

customer_reviews.title: 100% the best thing you can get to revive a tired mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress pad for a little over a month, and every night is like sleeping on a cloud! I was skeptical at first, especially given the good pricing. This was leaps and bounds above my expectations! This turned a 10 year old base model spring mattress into something that feels like you're sleeping at a 4 star hotel. I was all set to bite the bullet and purchase a brand new mattress for close to a thousand dollars but decided to try this out first as a last resort, stop gap solution. I'm so glad I did, and now we will be getting another handful of years of use out of our mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey B

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough, some damage upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: The good, two inches is perfect I have found 3 inch thickness to be too much. Fits the bed very well. The bad, the product arrived badly packaged, it had a small tear and one area was squished flat, I doubt it will regain its proper height. The odor coming off of the product was very very strong. 24 hours later still pretty stinky although I imagine it will dissipate. So I'm okay with the issues, although more considerate packing would have prevented any damage at all. Definitely open it in a room where you can air it out for a while maybe several days. My sister was also knocked over by the odor.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: I would write a review but I can’t get out of bed...
customer_reviews.text: Omg...so comfortable. I have a new, very nice mattress but I’ve realized that it’s a bit too firm and I ache when trying to go to sleep. My bed is soooo comfy now. This foam topper is intensely soft and amazing. Buy it! My only issue is that I think I need to get king size sheets (for my queen size bed) because between the thicker mattress and the 2” topper, there’s a lot to cover now.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh, now I can sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this topper because I was waking up every morning with hip and shoulder pain and feeling like I was approximately 80 years old. In other words, I need a new mattress. But it's Christmas time, and who wants to pay for a new mattress in December? Not me. This topper is my interim solution—and it's done the job! It's quite cozy and I'm sleeping better and waking up pain free. It did stink when it came out of the box (still does a bit), but not enough to make it unusable. I have no idea how long it will hold up, but it appears to be worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 for comfort, -2 for smell
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this a great review. It has made it possible for me to sleep better on an old mattress. But it stinks. I aired it for several days, flipping it over, keeping it in a room with an open window, ceiling fan, and closed door. It still stinks. I don't think I can get it back in a box because it's expanded, so I'll probably have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It helped for a little while
customer_reviews.text: This seemed thick enough - I loved it at first but then I got hip pain and I was getting too warm. I am very thin - so it could be that I am just too sensitive. Anyway, I took it off my bed and put it in my spare room and just slept on my old mattress for a while. After a few nights of that - I went back to my spare room, in the middle of the night and put the thing back on my bed. I sunk into it- fell into a good sleep - but woke up warm again. I just can't sleep on it every single night.
customer_reviews.author: Nina L

customer_reviews.title: cool nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying this. I sweat a lot at night so I thought I'd try it. I works great. Some reviews have said it doesn't hold up after a year. If it lasts a year it will be well worth it & I will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for a pullout couch
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a few months on a pullout couch and took it from sleeping on basically a boxspring to feeling like a mattress. I'm a hot sleeper and didn't feel like this got too hot or stayed cold. You need to be careful when putting it away because it is foam, and it will tear if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: RCS

customer_reviews.title: Solved joint pain problems with new mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have Rheumatoid Arthritis and our new mattress -- which we love -- was a little painful on my hip and shoulder joints, though perfect for my wife. So, we did some online research and tried this out. The Twin XL covers half of our King Size mattress and so far so good -- joint pain seems much better! Mattress is thick and cushy but still able to get the fitted sheet over it. Stays in place well so far. Haven't noticed any problems with "hot sleeping" that some folks attribute to memory foam. VERY pleased so far. Minimal smell and outgassing. My wife is VERY sensitive to that and had no complaints. So far a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: but not nearly comfortable enough. I saw that this mattress topper had ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a cheap IKEA mattress that is a little too firm for me. I constantly would wake wake up with back pain or neck pain, so I bought a mattress pad. It made it a little comfier, but not nearly comfortable enough. I saw that this mattress topper had really good reviews for the price (and I'm definitely not in the market for a new mattress), so I went for it. Wow. I had my first night of sleep on it last night and I woke up feeling rejuvenated. My only problem is that the bed gravity has gotten a whole lot stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Not how it is pictured, did not come to form.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really dissatisfied with this product. Opening and unrolling it was easy enough, but 24 hours later it still hadn't gotten formed correctly. It isn't even queen sized, it doesn't reach the bed edges. Pictures show it is flat in areas, thick in others and bulging. I would not recommend this product. Update: i agreed a new picture to show this still hasn't come to form. What an uncomfortable waste of $70.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Honigford

customer_reviews.title: Has Made a Big Difference with My Casper Mattress
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of those foam mattresses that gets shipped to you and really liked it for a few months. By the time it started causing back problems we were past the 100-day trial period and were stuck with the mattress. I ordered this topper to add a little more cushion to the mattress. It has mad a huge difference in my sleep. I'm a side and stomach sleeper and the foam mattress was causing back and hip pain. Now that I've added this foam topper, the back pain is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Zola Jones

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy to store, and extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper met my needs perfectly. I needed something light, flexible, to soften up a traditional Japanese sleeping mat. The mat rolls up each morning, so the mattress topper had to be able to roll up as well. This topper is extremely light--when laid on the floor, you can feel the floor beneath it. It just provides that extra bit of softness before the mattress it's on. But it's made a huge difference. I was thinking of giving up the mat in favor of a more traditional bed, but I've slept on this two nights now, and each morning I genuinely haven't wanted to get up, I was so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Wiley Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck! I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Best decision! It’s so hard to buy a topper from online, especially if you comb the reviews. I am so happy i went with this one for our guest bed. It turned a rock of a mattress into a comfortable, yet supportive bed. I had no issues with smell, tears or sizing. I let it fully expand for 2-3 days before putting sheets on the bed. I laid down to test it out and ended up taking a nap on a bed I couldn’t stand before! So happy to have my guests stay in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Courtneyyyy

customer_reviews.title: Good news
customer_reviews.text: Personally I ended up with a really good topper. It fluffs back to the original shape and very comfortable. I bough the 3” which was definitely the better option. The overall quality is nice. It’s slightly longer on the edges compare to my bed but that so much better than it being too small. You don’t have to wait the 24 hours for your topper to fully take shape. I gave mine 6 hours. Worked just fine
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: It will need to air out. Still like it
customer_reviews.text: Preferably outside or in garage with a fan, with airflow . Hanging on a fence or picnic table. We were skeptical. I am over 260. Two weeks in and this thing is a dream. We originally ordered the Avacado mattress(Highest rated of all mattresses by Consumer Reports this year or last). It was very firm and we did not give it a chance to get used to it. So we ordered this, let it air out for a few days, flipping a few times. We LOVE IT...two months later and still love it! We have it on top the highest rated AVACADO mattress. Great choice to soften the feel.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but definitely NOT cooling.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mainly for the “cooling gel” infusion, and it doesn’t cool at all. Like, not even a little bit. The memory foam is very soft and comfy. Careful with it though. I grabbed the top to barely adjust it, and ripped it a bit. This thing will likely fall apart quickly. For those looking for something to stop those night sweats, this ain’t the product. Nowhere close.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Dreamform. It is extending the life of my mattress. Very glad I purchased. The only downside is the Dreamform shifts and needs to be adjusted. I am disabled and in/on my bed 12 - 20 hours a day. Someone only sleeping on it would NOT have the issue. Easy fix to just slide it back in position. I still am not sure which side she face up. I turned it over after a few days to have the foam on top. Is the foam suppose to be on top?
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Frankovitch

customer_reviews.title: A MUST READ For Anyone
customer_reviews.text: With the Sure2Sleep 3 pound 2'' gel mattress on top, and this one on the bottom, I've never slept so well. Have degenerative disks and bad shoulders...this combination was amazing for the price. Update: May 31, 2017: The combination of these mattress toppers just keeps getting better with time. Last night I think I turned twice the whole night (right side, then left side). Haven't slept this good in years. What an awesome feeling for the price. Call company for discount code ($99 bucks total).
customer_reviews.author: Curious Designer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, Pungent Smell Plus Defective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this topper based on the good reviews. It arrived with a horrible, pungent odor and I immediately put it out on my screened in porch with two overhead fans running for two days. The odor is just as offensive as it was out of the box. In addition, there were small holes throughout the topper. I called Dreamfoam Bedding and they told me it should not smell this noxious after two days and there should not be holes in it. They refused to do anything about it and directed me back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Romes

customer_reviews.title: Good value for what you pay.
customer_reviews.text: I got this a little over two years ago for my college apartment, and other than it being a little yellow on one side, it's held up really well! The gel is nice- I was skeptical at first, but if you put your hands on the topper it does actually feel slightly cool. This is nice as it prevents you from overheating while you sleep. As expected and desired, the topper provides good support. You should definitely get this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Just got it today 08/16/2020... NO SMELL at all... Almost 3"
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE... Well I've had this for about 2 weeks and as far as sleeping it is does pretty good... Just got it today... NO SMELL at all... Almost 3" given that I have let it decompress for about 7hours. I am about 190lbs and this thing doesn't give much, I mean it is pretty solid. I don't know how it will sleep and help with my back and how comfortable it will be but I will come back and update!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a softer top on my new layered foam bed, so purchased this and have been very pleased. Even with a protector and sheet on top, it is very soft. It's not the cheap foam, but a dense memory foam. I've not noticed it being hot, but the weather is still cool. Being less expensive than what I found in local stores, I am pleased with the quality and price. It arrived quickly and in a box, and was no problem for my husband and I to put on the bed. Within a few hours, it had expanded to it's full 2" thickness. There was a slight odor, but it went away within a couple of nights.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: 100% yes!
customer_reviews.text: This pad is the difference between no sleep in our camper necessitating a new mattress ($500+) and again enjoying nights out camping. Smell? Yes initially. I unrolled it and left it to air out for a few days. It's been in our camper now for a couple weeks, absolutely no smell (aside from the clean sheets) and comfortable as all get out. If this mattress topper isn't working for you maybe it's not the pad... 😊
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: fell apart after less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I had a 2" one on my queen bed and loved it. I had it for over 2 years before moving and not taking the queen with me. I went to a twin xl after moving and a 3" topper for it since the previous one I had did so well. But in less then 4 months it has completely fallen apart. I am now debating on what I am going to replace it with. Dissatisfied with it though I wonder if it was defective or if I did something wrong this time around.
customer_reviews.author: scott robertson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quality, thick topper!
customer_reviews.text: This memory foam topper is great quality and does what it claims. I bought it for my mother who complained about her mattress not being comfortable on her pressure points. She complained that it made the bed too high for her to get in, but she has osteoarthritis and is bent over due to this, plus she is really short. After a month of complaining about it, I tried to remove it from her bed and she would not let me saying that it is comfy...so it is a win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: A bit big for RV Queen
customer_reviews.text: It was a big for my RV Queen bed that is a table fold down, but I just put the extra up in the back. I use it as a couch daybed during the day with many pillows. On thing I found is that while it is comfortable, it is hot and does not cool my body. The “cooling gel” swirled in does nothing to draw heat away, rather the foam holds the heat into your body. Keep that in mind. I still like it for the extra padding but gave it only 3 stars because of fit and lack of cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleet
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery in March 2019 - came home with 12 screws holding humerus together and a plate with 4 screws holding that in place. For weeks I could only sleep in a recliner. I ordered this since I had been wanting one anyway hoping this would make my transition to the bed easier. I can tell you that it has made a great difference. Due to how much better I sleep with this I have ordered one for my daughter's bed because her back is bothering her. I know this will help!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: 4 days of airing, still smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Going on 4 days being aired out and the odor is still strong. I have sprayed it with Febreeze and set it in front of a fan. Planning to put it on the bed for tonight. Hope I can sleep through the smell! Also hope it dissipates soon. Wasn't quite as cushy as I had hoped - but haven't slept on it yet. Wanted to do the review now though, because many people question the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: I had just put a lot of money into a good mattress, but chose one too firm
customer_reviews.text: Solved all my problems! I had just put a lot of money into a good mattress, but chose one too firm. Everything hurt, every night. In desperation, I ordered the gel swirl topper. After being unwrapped, it gave off a slight odor, but that went away in just a few hours. I am now sleeping in total comfort, and it never heats up. I never perspire. Five stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Canny shopper

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable! You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best mattress topper I’ve bought. It makes our futon mattress more comfortable than our regular bed! I bought it so that my mother in law would be more comfortable staying with us since my parents were going to be staying in our dedicated guest room while she was staying in the nursery on our old futon (so many parents around 😱). She said ordinarily she tosses and turns all night but on our futon she slept great! Would highly recommend this. We’ll probably be purchasing one for our own bed and maybe the guest bed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal O

customer_reviews.title: I like it! Size is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Size is perfect, it was easy to unroll on the bed and it works as advertised. The smell is minimal! Unrolling: from the headboard end, and the left side of the bed (as if you are laying on the bed facing up), unroll to your left and to the end of bed, then unroll across the bed to the other side. If you did it correctly, it fits perfectly across the top of the mattress without having to pull and tug!
customer_reviews.author: SteveD

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I'd hardly call this memory foam, it springs back to normal within a second. I bought this to replace a different topper that was aging but cost more and that was apparently worth it. After 3 years my old one retained more memory than this new. It's also extremely fragile, after using it a few days I thought I'd switch out with my old one and it tore a few places under it's own weight. I'll definitely be looking elsewhere for my next.
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: great way to get more life out of an older mattress
customer_reviews.text: A valuable investment and a great way to get more life out of an older mattress. I still need a new mattress but I can delay that purchase for a while longer. I already had a down mattress topper but it just wasn't enough for me. The down topper on top of this foam pad feels almost luxurious. If I did have a proper mattress the combination would surely be heavenly. Product arrives compressed but relaxed to a usable form within a few hours and I had it on my mattress the same day it arrived. Slept wonderfully. Did not notice any weird chemical odor and I am very sensitive to such things.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Bare Root

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this at college. We tried another one prior to this which did not measure up. My daughter loves this and says It’s incredibly soft and cushiony to the point I just might buy one for myself. At home she has a soft memory foam mattress and prefers her softer college bed, thanks to this topper. She said it makes her sheets harder to put back on the he bed after washing the sheets but it’s well worth it. And it doesn’t move much once she positions it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gb

customer_reviews.title: awesome product, slept like a baby first night
customer_reviews.text: love this pad, feels awesome like a new bed, i got the shorter one so it doesnt have extra bulk hanging over the mattress when you put a fitted sheet on. put it on the bed and let it expand for about 2 hours when i first got it and is wonderful, no odor at all. well worth the money. i have trouble sleeping for more than 2 or 3 hours at a time and i was able to sleep at least 5 hours without waking up the first night i had this, so glad i got it
customer_reviews.author: ian

customer_reviews.title: SO Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies and gents, you HAVE to get this. My back pain is gone, I don't toss and turn anymore and my sleep tracker is showing that I have much less incidents of restlessness during the night. Also, it's super comfy. This is worth every penny. It's my second one. The first one I bought a few years ago was the 2" queen version but this time I got the 4" king version and wow that extra 2 inches makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: John Scottsdale

customer_reviews.title: Yes sleep sort of
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a box wrapped super tight. It is hard to unroll. But once you to and it inflates to its actual size it's like sleeping on a piece of heaven. Update I've had this for a few weeks now I would suggest either really tight fitting sheets or to glue it to your mattress as with tossing and turning etc it does not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: A.miliotis

customer_reviews.title: Great topper!
customer_reviews.text: It is a good topper. The chemical smell subsides within a few days. My mattress is too hard so this helps. My only complaint if you can call it that, is that it slightly larger than my queen sized bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenslyric

customer_reviews.title: Get Ready for Some Zzzzz’s
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we have purchased this product because my daughter said it was the most comfortable mattress topper she had ever slept on. We purchased the first one three years ago but it was destroyed in a flood. We were thrilled to see that it was still available and for almost the same price. It was deliver quickly and only needed a few hours after removed from the packaging to be sleep ready.
customer_reviews.author: McFunFamily

customer_reviews.title: Great product - just right.
customer_reviews.text: Got a new bed with a memory-foam mattress and while the mattress was good, it was a bit firmer than either my wife or I preferred. Noticed this one had good reviews so gave it a shot. Both of us are very happy. Virtually no smell when the package was opened but let it air and expand for several hours before putting on bed and enjoy the bed much more now.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: 30 day UPDATE!!!
customer_reviews.text: 30 day UPDATE!!! =NO BACKACHES, no joint aches!!! Would gladly buy 6 of these a year, (-WERE IT NECESSARY...) for this level of comfort! I was concerned the "cool foam" might make my 'cold natured' wife uncomfortable. She detects NO difference. I am sure there might be other toppers that do the same job. But this is OURS. (=Just so you know, have not received any compensation for this or any other review. No freebies, no gifts or money.)
customer_reviews.author: CLEMhoun

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Odor
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how this was rated as highly as it is. The smell that comes from this is terrible. I placed it on my bed when I opened it--I can't sleep on this. The topper has given me migraines that are so bad that I couldn't sleep. I needed to take it off my mattress and out of my room. It also left a residual odor on my current mattress that even baking soda won't take off.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: I have very comfortable nights since this has been put on
customer_reviews.text: No Problems here. Mattress decompressed very quickly and I did not notice any strong chemical smells. I have very comfortable nights since this has been put on. I don't find myself sleeping any "hotter" than before due to the mattress. I read several reviews that this mattress relieved their back pain. I have an arthritic back and although I cant say that this has helped, it certainly hasn't made anything worse. I like this mattress and I am pleased with tthe purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! FALSE ADVERTIZING!! NOT VISCO-ELASTIC MEMORY FOAM111
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer's information says this topper is made of "visco-elastic gel-infused memory foam." IT IS NOT!!! This topper is simply cheap polyfoam sprayed with a sticky blue substance. When you press your hand into authentic memory foam and then raise your hand there is a residual "memory" indentation of your hand print in the surface of the foam. With this topper there is no residual "memory" indentation left in the foam--your handprint disappears immediately as the surface of the foam springs back to its original shape. Do not waste your money buying a cheap imitation of memory foam. DO NOT ORDER THIS PRODUCT. See other similar reviews in the 1 star reviews of this product.
customer_reviews.author: LTC

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my daughter after her back started bothering her. She thanked me, saying that it made a huge difference, but I didn’t think about it too much. One day I happened to lay down on her bed and was amazed at how much softer it was than my new mattress. Who would have believed that 2 inches of foam could feel so good! I immediately ordered a second one. So happy that I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: CaeMBoy

customer_reviews.title: smelt kinda funny when I first arrived
customer_reviews.text: smelt kinda funny when I first arrived, got used to it or it faded away within about 48 hours. It took a couple days before the pad was fully expanded (with me sleeping on it nightly). Otherwise, no cons. I broke my right arm about 19 months ago, if I sleep on my right side I get nauseous. Since getting this I get far less nauseous. I can't swear that it is this product because I also got a new mattress and pillow at the same time and just as time goes on I do get less nauseous... but I'd say that this topper is about 80% of the recent improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Karjala

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this topper! It’s not hot like most memory foam but it is a little bit warmer. I definitely sleep better with it. My hips and knees don’t ache like they used to with just my mattress but it didn’t help my back as much as I thought it would. I still recommend it because it is incredibly comfortable and there could be more to my back pain than just my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: ... on it to top a firm mattress and have enjoyed it so far
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been sleeping on it to top a firm mattress and have enjoyed it so far. We do like it but it definitely sleeps a little on the warm side. We don't think the "Gel Swirls" do anything in terms of actually cooling your body while you're asleep. Also, because it retains a lot of the heat, be prepared to wake up a little sweatier than you're used to. In terms of softening the mattress, it's fantastic. I only wish it actually cooled your sleeping experience.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Goes flat in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Well, for $67 you certainly get what you pay for! I’ve had this mattress pad for nearly a year and it was great for the first 7 months or so - then it went practically flat. My mattress is too hard, and we bought this with the hopes that we could avoid buying a whole new mattress - initially it was great, super comfy but not tooooo soft. Then after several months I started waking up several times a night with aching hips, then lower back, then shoulders. Unfortunately with the speed at which this product lost its loft I regret spending the money on it, but I guess I’m grateful that we got another year out of our mattress.
customer_reviews.author: shawna ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed so far
customer_reviews.text: Just had this delivered. It came shrink wrapped and condensed. It had zero instructions so I unpeeled everything and laid it on the floor. No idea how long it’s supposed to stay open? I hope it fluffs up it looks more like a twin size. It also smells horrible. I’ll update my review in a few days (?) when I can actually use it. So far I’m disappointed I spent $$$ and they couldn’t include a simple paper with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: BeckaW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress topper! I originally got it in a twin size during my pregnancy because I got very sore and uncomfortable when trying to sleep. This added the perfect extra cushion that I needed. After my pregnancy ended I continued to use it, and when my husband saw how comfortable my side of the bed was, we ordered a king size to cover our entire bed. We are very happy with it! There may be a slight smell from the foam when it is first unpacked but this will go away after a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: JRSwan

customer_reviews.title: Good to soften up a mattress
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put on a mattress I ordered because previous reviews said it was too firm. Unfortunately my bed doesn’t need it but I’m keeping this item anyways because this topper is just that nice. If I decide not to use it I’ll put it on the guest bed for added comfort. My only concern is that it’s not “cooling” and actually holds heat in.
customer_reviews.author: Gere

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for My College Daughter But It Is Not Memory Foam
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to put on top of the Zinus Memory Foam 10 Inch Green Tea Mattress that I also purchased since reviews said it is firm. It immediately inflated out of the box and was in perfect condition. If you push your hand into the foam and pull back, it does not leave an impression like memory foam. But she likes it so I guess that is what is important. So it is a good 2 inch FOAM topper.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil J Markwood

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3" topper to place on top of an air mattress and I'm so happy I did! It feels like I'm sleeping on a cloud and I go into a deep sleep with no tossing and turning. I initially found this item because of positive review on Wirecutter, but was hesitant to buy it because of an updated review on Wirecutter that said it smelled. When I took it out of the well-packaged wrapping, I didn't smell anything at all. Very glad I took a chance. It's well worth every penny of the very reasonable cost compared to other memory foam toppers.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne DiBlasi

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a much more comfortable bed! (I would even suggest going up to ...
customer_reviews.text: Really helped with our cheap camper mattress. We also added a filled mattress topper that adds another 1/2 in. of cushion. Makes for a much more comfortable bed! (I would even suggest going up to the 3" also, I think that would be even better). The odor from the topper was very mild and did not bother us at all. We put it right on the bed and it wasn't even noticeable once the cover and sheets were on the bed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because it is very comfortable and feels plush while laying on it. However, the advertised cooling effect failed me. I still wake up at night feeling warm and the mattress topper is warm underneath me, so I end up moving onto a different spot to cool off. If you purchase this product for the coolness, well, good luck. It is very comfortable though and would definitely reduce motion if you shift a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S.

customer_reviews.title: natural latex one in the past (which I love! )
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about buying this as we bought a much more expensive, natural latex one in the past (which I love!). However, due to illness in family, I need to sleep downstairs for a few months on the guest room mattress which really needs to be replaced. This item is very comfortable and has helped relieve the pain in my aching, arthritic joints. I'll still have to buy a new bed but will probably use this on top of the new one too. No smell & easy to put on the bed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: g. r. c. s.

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing with a vengeance, but my wife loves it so I split the difference with the rating. I’m a big guy and this is way too soft for me and my back. It is also a pain to try to keep in place as it try’s to move aro7nd on the bed every time you turn in the night.
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Cooler?
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to sleep 25% cooler than traditional mattress toppers, I, in fact, think it's the opposite. I had a 1.5 inch Canopy brand (Walmart) prior, and it was better than this one, I'm disappointed, but can not send it back because I will never ever ever get it back in the box! LOL, It is comfortable though, so if coolness is not what you are looking for, this is a nice topper for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ausemm

customer_reviews.title: -100 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a musty, moldy smell. Unfortunately the smell intensified with use. We woke with headaches, then sinus and respiratory issues. Our poor little dog who sleeps with us was diagnosed with an airborne fungal infection! I contacted Amazon via chat line and spoke with someone called Kamini. I was told I would not have to return the product and a credit was issued. HOWEVER, I received an email with instructions to return the topper and a refund would be issued upon receipt Minus shipping charges! I am beyond furious! The first vet bill alone cost $381.61. I should sue for damages!
customer_reviews.author: MLS

customer_reviews.title: Great service but just so so on the item.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stall buying a new mattress. This makes my bed feel a little better but not great. I was wanting something more on the firm side but a lot of the reviews I read said not to get a real thick one if you have back issues. I wish I would have gone with a thicker one now. But the service was great...it arrived very fast and was easy to take out of the packaging and put on my bed. I noticed a slight smell for a couple of days and then it went away.
customer_reviews.author: Dpagel

customer_reviews.title: You need to purchase this!!
customer_reviews.text: This topper is wonderful! My Casper mattress is much too firm and sleeps warm. This topper added the extra comfort I needed and I don’t wake up feeling tired! It was shipped in a timely manner and was packaged extremely well. The pad is as advertised and had no odor. I am extremely pleased and highly recommend! This is AN AMERICAN COMPANY AND MADE IN THE USA!! This is the reason I ultimately purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to turn over or get out of bed
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable but when turning over or getting out - your hand sinks into the memory phone which takes a second or two and takes more strength more... but I do love the comfort of this topper!
customer_reviews.author: Brierezy Lady

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I actually really liked this thing!!! I thought 2 inches of foam wasn’t gonna do me any good but I was wrong. Bought a brand new mattress that was way too firm for me, so I remembered my old college roommate had one of these and decided to give it a try. Made a huge difference and I’m super glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Specs didn’t fit well. Really soft.
customer_reviews.text: Just the worst. Way too small for the king but is obviously not large enough for a queen. About 4 inches short width and 5 inches short length. Continues to shrink. Moderate cooling, so it might help a dense bed that sleeps hot. Really, really soft, which could be good or bad depending on how you like your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Optimus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life - Buy this yesterday!
customer_reviews.text: Long story short, was talked into buying a super firm bed at a store that rhymes with Ashley after using their silly bed computer. The bed made a parking lot feel soft. After using this, the bed feels like normal/like it should. It is no frills, as it’s literally just a square foam pad with nothing else, but feels way better than expected. If you have similar bed issues, or just want a softer feel, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Usafloadc17

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: 4.5 Stars. I really like this mattress topper; it is very comfortable. When it arrived, it had a slight smell. I let it air out in a spare room for 5 days before putting it on my bed and then it was completely fine. I'm a hot sleeper, so I do get a little warm on this, but not overly so. I purchased because my mattress is getting older, but I'm not ready to buy a new one; yet, I was also having shoulder pain sleeping on it. After 2 weeks, this topper seems to have solved that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect answer and I sleep great on it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is thick and soft!! I'm currently overseas (military) and the mattresses are used by hundreds to thousands of people so they are a bit worn. This was the perfect answer and I sleep great on it!! Side note: make sure you buy a sheet set one size bigger than your mattress because I had a twin sized bed and had to buy a full sized mattress fitted sheet to cover this and the mattress at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: KLICK

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am VERY satisfied with this product. No oder. It's super super soft. I'm going to give it 5 stars because I'm confident that I will sleep very well on this mattress topper. I will adjust my review if anything changes! Update! It’s abaolutely amazing and I’m very happy with the purchase. I’ve been sleeping on it for about a week now and I have no pain!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Doucette
